Description:
SPACE AND PRIVACY
Our young family has already started writing the chapter for their next life's journey and are very keen to get there. They are looking for someone who will enjoy this home as much as they have, and can't wait to show you what's on offer. We have had many requests for larger space, peace, quiet and privacy. This family home will tick your wish list.
In a quiet street in Clifton Springs a suburb on the Bellarine Peninsula is where the current family love the visibility to watch the children from the front and the back. A high fence keeps the kids and animals safe. Having been built in 1972 we know that they don't build them like this anymore. As they say in they say in the trade "it has good bones".
Large lounge room with a bay window seat, along with the added warmth of the wood heater in winter. One bathroom has been renovated and is now combined with the laundry. The shed could be tradie heaven, with another area nearby that could be become a man cave or extra accommodation for visitors. Thinking outside the square a fire pit has been placed in the top right hand corner of the block to make the most of the view. An outdoor shower for when you return from the beach or fishing. For me I would enjoy sitting under the Al Fresco area drinking coffee or wine listening to the trickle of the pond.
Enough about the outside, inside is a cosy place to be hanging out with family and friends. Time for you to come see for yourself. Let me show you what's behind the fence.
Insights: 14-16 Almerta Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
COLOUR YOUR LIFE WITH THIS AFFORDABLE OPTION ON APP. 820 SQM
A wistful garden full of colour frames this meticulously maintained home, a real surprise. Light and bright with a long verandah and outdoor entertaining patio. The lounge room is adjacent to the dining room and kitchen, combines as an open plan and all overlooks the vibrant garden. Four bedrooms, all with BIR'S, 2 way central bathroom , separate toilet and laundry. Features include gas heater, Fireplace, quality window furnishings (outdoor as well) , good storage, water tank, garden shed and fruit trees. Double enclosed carport and plenty of room for the caravan and boat. You will delight in this home nothing to do but enjoy space and privacy while living on the Bellarine Penisula.

Description:
A Masterpiece
This architecturally designed home situated on approx. 781 sqm of land, offers panoramic views from the City of Geelong across Corio Bay to the You Yangs & beyond. Stunning is an understatement with vaulted ceilings a feature throughout the living areas. The house is cleverly designed over four levels & certainly impresses. Located at the top of the court, high on the hill, you will enjoy the peacefulness of this area.
A large open study as you enter would be ideal as a home office.
The indoor fernery display between the stairs is simply stunning by design & the central showpiece of the house when your guests arrive.
The kitchen has plenty of bench space, a breakfast bar, wall oven, dishwasher & pantry.
The dining & casual lounge has floor to ceiling windows creating a light filled relaxing ambience.
The generous second & third bedrooms are located on the second level with built in robes are serviced by the central bathroom on the same level.
The third level casual lounge with a covered balcony offers amazing panoramic views of the water you will never tire of.
On the fourth level is the kingsize master bedroom with views to die for, a large walk through robe & spacious ensuite.
With a large block comes a great backyard with an amazing sheltered outdoor BBQ area. Even the views from here a great.
There is a double sink fish cleaning area, small garden tool shedding.
Double garage with internal access.
Would make an impressive AirBNB guesthouse, holiday house or family home needing space.
Insights: 4 Wardoo Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
An Entertaining Delight
Located in a sought after pocket of Clifton Springs flanked for choice when it comes to amenities you really do have all that you need on your doorstep; a short stroll to the Pinnaroo Avenue shops, Clifton Springs Primary and the Foreshore. A short drive/walk to the Curlewis Shopping precinct including Woolworths, bulk billing clinic and a 24 hour chemist amongst other shops with the Drysdale Township just around the corner; with location ticking all the boxes this tidy setup will appeal to first home owners, downsizers, retirees and investors.
Comprising 3 bedrooms all fitted with ceiling fans and built-in robes, the master with a walk-in robe and ensuite, main bathroom with bath and shower, separate toilet, ample sized laundry all located at the fore of the home. The hub of the home where all the entertaining will be has consists of an open plan kitchen, dining, living area which opens up onto an expansive undercover deck area including a tranquil water feature and ensuring enough room to make entertaining a breeze. A well- presented front yard with plenty of parking and side access into the garden, an extremely low maintenance back yard where you can do as little or as much as you would like.
Features of the home include wide hallways, an abundance of LED lights, power points, data points, foxtel points also including a 3 phase power plug in the garage, oversized double lock up garage including built in work bench, ample cupboards and rear access into the yard with remote and internal access, split system heating and cooling in the master bedroom and in the main living area, ceiling fans throughout, gas cooktop and stone bench tops in the kitchen.
Homes like these are sought after especially in this pocket of Clifton Springs where you are close to everything you need.
Insights: 33 Mirrabooka Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 131 Clifton Springs Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Character, Charm & Practicality
This Tudor inspired home will have you captivated as there is nothing quite like it in the area; just12 years young this home is a perfect example of quality craftsmanship and exudes old European charm throughout the home and within the gardens.
The practicality of this home is within the free flowing floor plan that is split over two levels. The high ceilings and character trims combine leave a warm and inviting feeling not to mention the multitude of options with how this home can be presented.
The ground floor is home to a spacious and cozy family room with a large gas feature log fire and double door access onto the entertaining area. The kitchen offers a fantastic central work bench, gas cook top, dishwasher, stainless steel appliances, built-in wine rack, pantry and lots of cupboard/drawer space. The kitchen overlooks a vast meals and living area which flows nicely to the 4th bedroom/study and bathroom which is the ideal set up for and elderly family member. The laundry completes this ground level.
The open staircase leads to the first floor which hosts 3 bedrooms, 2 with built-in robes and the master suite with a lavish walk-in robe and full ensuite including corner spa bath, shower and W.C. Conveniently zoned by the remaining bedrooms is a main bathroom with bath, shower and separate W.C.
This property is set back on the block behind beautifully established hedges, trees and greenery giving this home great street appeal and a feel of enchantment. The hedge lined steps from the front garden lead through to the back garden via the fish pond where you will find a great undercover entertaining area, terraced gardens and a quaint sitting area opposite the vegetable patch. This property is secured with gates out the front and either side of the home and the well-kept established gardens offer a wealth of privacy.
Features of this rousing home include; central heating, evaporative cooling, raked ceilings, multiple storage cupboards including linen press and under stairs storage, DLUG with remote entry and 2 garden tanks a 500L and 13000L.
Within Proximity to Beacon Reserve/Bay, the boat ramp, Clifton Springs Golf Club, local schools and shopping hub including Aldi, Coles and Woolworths.
Insights: 131 Clifton Springs Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Million Dollar Views!
Don't have a million dollar budget for a water front property? ... this property could be the very next best thing!! Uninterrupted water views literally at your back door step - and believe me they are million dollar views.
-Charming BV residence; jarrah, bamboo and slate flooring
-Spectacular sweeping water views to the rear (Beacon Point Reserve)
-A custom built decked pergola provides a wonderful area to admire panoramic water views, stunning sun rises, front row tickets to the Avalon Air Show and the wide open spaces of Beacon Point Reserve at your back fence
-An enviable 300m approx. walk to the water's edge
-Double carport, rear side access via dual hinged gates and an additional 7.4m x 4m approx garage/workshop (concrete floor and powered)
-3 bedrooms all have built in robes; the master and 2nd bedroom boast a feature 'port window' that capture water views
-Modernised bathroom is spacious and is complete with a spa bath
-All the modern comforts; zoned ducted heating, wall unit air conditioner
-A prime land holding of 585m2 approx
Insights: 15 Coolangatta Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Classic holiday home
Escape to the coast with all the modern amenities just minutes away. Looking for that holiday home that caters for the whole family? There is even a decent glimpse of the bay.
Downstairs lock up single garage & adjoining games room. Small kitchenette.
Three downstairs bedrooms. Two with built in robes.
Large family lounge, dining area. Classic galley style kitchen. Powder room.
This home is in original condition & has been a much loved family holiday home for many years.
Situated on a large block of 655 sqm & a large backyard there could be scope for development (S.T.C.A) or build the big boat shed.
Located to adjoining parkland offering tennis courts, skate park, adventure playgrounds & open space. The Clifton Springs boat ramp is just down the road.

Description:
Brand Sparkling New Townhouse On Its Own Title!
Boasting its own title and plentiful off-street parking, this brand sparkling new townhouse presents compact living with all of the perks! Just a short drive from the scenic coastline, this home is an irresistible choice whether you're a first home buyer, savvy investor, or looking to downsize in style!
With public transport just footsteps away, a convenient and carefree lifestyle is part of the package. Your weekends will be filled with outdoor adventures with the Clifton Springs Golf Course, boat ramp, and an array of open parklands a heartbeat away. The bustling hub of Drysdale places shops, supermarkets, cafes, and restaurants within easy reach. Growing families will be spoilt for choice with Beacon Point Pre-School, Clifton Springs Primary School, and Drysdale Primary School just moments away.
Set back from the street front, you'll appreciate the sense of security this home offers.
Crisp white walls, dark carpet, and floor tiles enhance the light-filled interiors. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates a wealth of space and opens onto the outdoor zone via a glass sliding door - why not use this outdoor zone as a gorgeous alfresco for entertaining family and friends?
The kitchen will impress cooking enthusiasts with generous bench space and a large walk-in pantry with bench. A dishwasher, 900mm Emilia stainless steel freestanding oven, gas hob, and canopy rangehood perfectly blend style with functionality.
Both the living zone and Master Bedroom have been positioned to capture the northern light. The generous Master Bedroom features a large walk-in robe leading through to the en suite, which is complete with a semi-frameless shower, single vanity, and toilet.
Two additional bedrooms with mirrored built-in robes, fresh main bathroom with semi-frameless shower, and laundry with external access complete the well-designed floorplan.
A split-system air conditioner keeps you comfortable in all seasons, while other features include a flywire screen to the main sliding door and ample TV connection points throughout.
Featuring off-street parking for both cars and caravans, this townhouse really stands out from the pack. The long, wide driveway fits two cars side-by-side, while the single aluminium cantilever carport with polycarbonate roof provides shelter. If not used as an alfresco, the outdoor zone will easily accommodate caravan or trailer storage.
Low-maintenance gardens add a lovely touch of greenery, while the water tank and garden shed complete this terrific property. You'll need to act quickly to avoid disappointment, so inspect ASAP!
Insights: 10A Gwinganna Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Calling all tradies - 3 car garage!
Your bay life style awaits you in the heart of Clifton Springs at this super 4 bedroom family home! Step inside to open plan family living with the spacious master bedroom offering you a full ensuite & walk in robe. Adjacent is the study perfect for a home office or nursery. Tiles flow to a light filled carpeted lounge, the hub for the family with a bonus of internal access from the garage. Additional 3 large bedrooms all have built in robes perfect for the large family. Central modern bathroom has a deep bath perfect to unwind and relax in & a seperate shower. Stylish kitchen has black Caesar stone bench tops with a 900mm stainless steel 5 burner gas cook top and electric fan forced oven plus dishwasher. Not to mention a huge walk in pantry & fridge area. Dinning/2nd living has sliding doors to a pergola with built in seats perfect to entertain or kick back a enjoy reading a book. Back yard has a fantastic wrapped decking with still plenty of room for kids and pets to run free. 3 car garage is ideal for the car enthusiast boasting rear access into the backyard plus off street parking for 3 cars, even a boat or caravan. Evaporative cooling, ducted heating & even ducted vacuuming are additional features of this stunning home. Only a mere 8 years this Simmonds build sits pretty on a generous allotment of approximately 623m2
Insights: 25 Parrakoola Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Stellar Starter or Ideal Investment
Set in a revered court location with the Clifton Springs Golf Club just over the road and the stunning Clifton Springs Foreshore just minutes away, you are truly flanked for choice when it comes to amenities with public transport, schools, shopping centers, medical clinics and so much more all within reach.
This ultra-tidy and updated home comprises 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes and ceiling fans, large living room and kitchen with electric cooking, dishwasher, ample cupboards overlooking the dining area.
Main bathroom with bath, shower and tasteful plantation shutters, separate toilet and laundry complete this comfy brick beauty.
The front and back gardens are well-kept including planter boxes and a large 4.2m x 8.2m x 3m high (approx.) garage with excellent wide side access making it easy to bring boats, trailers, cars and landscaping equipment into the back yard.
Features include split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans, linen press all situated upon 604m2 block with subdivision potential (STCA).
This versatile property makes for the perfect first home, downsizers dream and/or a fantastic investment with the possibility of future development.
Insights: 6 Cameo Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Grand Elegance
Magnificent family home with multiple living zones set on a large allotment. Offering a generous separate formal lounge & dining area.
Excellent open plan kitchen, dining & casual living. Kitchen with twin draw dishwasher, gas cooktop, wall oven, floating timber floors & a large walk in pantry.
The third downstairs guest bedroom has easy access & private access to the central bathroom & would be ideal for co-generational living arrangements.
The rumpus / games rooms with adjoining spa would make a great entertaining area or teenager retreat.
Upstairs offers a private parent retreat lounge, covered balcony with views over Geelong, Corio Bay. The master bedroom with ensuite & walk in robe. A second upstairs bedroom could also double as a study / office. There is also an attic storage room.
The beautifully landscaped gardens are well established, two garden sheds, vegetable patch & offer a private setting.
Double garage has drive through access to the rear yard for boat or caravan storage.
Solar panels to reduce energy costs, central heating, split-system air-conditioning are just some of the features of this excellent property.
An outstanding opportunity to live close to the town centre with easy access to schools.
Insights: 60 Barrands Lane, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Classic Family Living in the Springs
Superbly perched on the rise of Central Road proudly sits this classic brick home. Commanding north facing bay windows capture the panorama of Corio Bay from the main living area and the master suite. Perfect orientation on this large corner plot of 765m2 (approx) with the full spectrum of daylight enhancing every aspect of the abode. A generously proportioned home with an intuitive layout, harmoniously balanced between open space and principal rooms. The kitchen, living and dining areas form a continuous space with two separate living areas adjacent to this main domain. Currently set as a study and a second lounge, these two rooms effectively augment the central open space conducive to family living of all ages. The sleeping quarters are zoned into the eastern wing, with 3 bedrooms, main bathroom, ensuite, separate WC and laundry. The master is a clever discreet design, with both a WIR and BIR. The modern ensuite is placed for ultimate privacy and the bay window elegantly frames the room. The interior is set on a timeless monochromatic palette accented with warm neutral hues. Tile flooring in high traffic areas merge effortlessly with carpet. Climate comfort is assured with ducted heating and a split air system for the central area. Updated fresh tiling in all wet areas, with an on-trend subway splashback in the kitchen. The property offers a secure yard, alfresco setting, DLUG (int. access) and a wide deep set driveway suitable for a trailer, boat or caravan to be tucked away. An inspection will impress.
Insights: 41 Central Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Welcome To My Humble Abode
What we have on offer is rarer than hen's teeth, often sought but rarely found. This very cozy home would make for an ideal first home, the perfect addition to the investment portfolio, a great half way house for singles or couples and I'm sure you would all agree this cozy cabin sets the theme for a marvelous weekender/ holiday investment- at this price point you really can't go wrong!
Comprising 2 bedrooms with the mezzanine decked out as the second bedroom, bathroom/laundry, kitchenette /meals/living. Doors that open up onto the balcony where you can enjoy a wine or a morning coffee whilst looking over the leafy garden all set upon 585m2.
An updated home with low maintenance gardens doesn't leave anything for the new owners to do however, if you are feeling creative there are a multitude of ways to improve this property and opportunity to add plenty of value.
Features include split system heating and cooling, gas feature fire, timber floors, gas stove top and garden shed.
* The first available time to inspect this property will be at the open homes listed.
Insights: 43 Whitcombes Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
The Pinnacle of Lifestyle Excellence
If you are in search of the WOW factor then look no further than what we have on offer! With an abundance of room to move this home offers practicality, lifestyle and family living on grand proportions.
With tasteful street appeal and an inviting entry this property will have you feeling at home in no time at all. The ground level is bright, airy and very open with expansive living areas. Upon entry you will find a large home/office study, spacious first living equipped with projector and screen power points and wired for surround sound. With ample under stairs storage plus more storage located in the powder; a very practical galley style kitchen with black granite benchtops, stainless steel appliance including 900mm gas cooking, dishwasher and microwave with an appliance garage and extra drawers and a walk in pantry that is conveniently linked to a fully fitted out laundry room with external access. The hub of the home is set up such a way that entertaining will be a breeze; the kitchen overlooks a large dining area, rumpus room, sitting area and alfresco all within view. The rumpus room, sitting area and alfresco all enjoy timber sliders/stackers equipped with heavy duty fly screen doors.
The first floor is hosts a grand master suite with double door entry, lush walk in robe, full ensuite including double vanity, double shower with 2 shower heads and separate toilet; the master suite also enjoys the most delightful bay views with even better views from the balcony. Bedrooms 2-3 enjoy Built-in robes and bedroom 4 with a walk in robe. A main bathroom with shower, vanity and spa bath, separate toilet, 2x storage cupboards and 3rd living area complete the first floor.
Outside enjoys a large undercover entertaining alfresco area equipped with power, speakers, café blinds and sauna room, the remainder of the yard is split into a paved area with clothes line, a raised astroturfed area with cubby house (with views) and sand pit PLUS a fantastic fully fenced pool and powered garden shed; all the gardens and outdoor areas are well-kept and low maintenance.
This 40+ square home comes with an abundance of features such as ducted heating throughout, evaporative cooling on the first floor, alarm system, ample storage and the ultimate water storage system with 4 x stainless steel rain catcher tanks located at the side of the house and a double lock up garage with remote entry and rear access.
Located in the ever popular pocket of Clifton Springs with the Drysdale Township and shops at one end of the street, The Dell, foreshore and Jetty only minutes away and flanked for choice when it comes to all of your amenities including schools, transport, shops, clinics, parks and reserves.
This is the ultimate family package; it ticks ALL of the boxes any growing family!
Insights: 39 Barrands Lane, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
INVEST OR BUY HERE IN CLIFTON SPRINGS
In this current market if you do not decide quickly you will miss the boat to buy in an area that has all the markers of progress and change. Having kept itself quiet for the best part of fifty years the secret is out. Clifton Springs is the suburb of choice to either invest or buy in. This property is currently tenanted with a long term tenant who would like to remain. The features include court location, four bedroom and two bathrooms. Potential for the large shed if required.
So what is your preference? Maybe you are looking to relocate here when you retire in a few years and are happy to have the home tenanted in the meantime. Maybe you want your first home to be something you can do some improvements on and sell and do it again. In a suburb that has it all and more, it is a good choice. Recently opened driving range, mini golf course, existing boat ramp, golf courses, bike trails, sporting clubs, the list goes on. Tell me what you need and I will confirm that we have it here.
Insights: 5 Coral Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
5 MINUTES FROM FRONT DOOR TO THE BAY.......WOW!
No. 6 is situated on approx. 710 SQM, perfect bay position and the home has been maintained deligently to impress the new owner. The formal living includes dining and lounge , all with north light , the second informal area alows for flexible use includes kitchen , dining and living , all overlooking the outdoor undecover alfresco area and delightful gardens. Three bedrooms , master with ensuite and WIR, remaining two with BIR'S. Central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the floorplan. Features include evaporative cooling, pantry, split system, Rinnae space heater, central heating (available but not on) , quality fittings ,water tank and more. The double carport is more like a garage with extra space for offf road, large shed as well. The garden is matured as well as providing delights for the cook..... A great home in such a top spot.
Insights: 6 Coolangatta Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Build the perfect seachange!
Set in the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula, the quiet streets of Clifton Springs offer a peaceful setting for those seeking a sea change. Build your dream home on this 599sqm (approx.) elevated block and benefit from dual street access, on this prime corner block.
Close to schools, golf courses and substantial shops, this is a location that has something for everyone.
Family sea changers can enjoy the relaxed lifestyle of the region and benefit from plenty of options for schooling and recreation. It's an easy commute to Melbourne via the new Portarlington -CBD ferry located 10 mins away or a short walk to the bus stop.
This is the ultimate blank canvas to build your coastal lifestyle, surrounded by some of Victoria's best beaches and bays.
- Quiet streetscape
- Close to beaches, schools, shops and sports clubs
- 10 mins away from the Portarlington - CBD ferry service for Melbourne commuting
- Near to local wineries, restaurants and regular markets
Insights: 44 Dundundra Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
LAND IS SCARCE HERE ESPECIALLY WITH VIEWS
Looking to build your dream home with uninterrupted views overlooking Corio Bay?
I have the block for you. Just listed in the suburb of Clifton Springs up on a hill.
Imagine sitting on your new deck watching the fireworks, the Air Show, ships sailing by, yacht races, storms etc.
In an area of Clifton Springs where high calibre homes have been erected, your only decision is what design you will choose to make the most of the location. Your own piece of paradise awaits your dreams.
Why here, why now? Pick your own adventure, golf, fishing, cricket, football, restaurants, cafes, bike riding, dancing. Whatever activity the kids enjoy it is on offer here together with many school choices, great shopping complexes and medical centres, the list goes on.
Insights: 17 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Could this be your Sea Change?
This three bedroom brick veneer home is everything you need for a terrific start by the sea plus more! Positioned on a low maintenance allotment, this family home is offering a terrific start for your first home or potential investment property. The well maintained home offers you the chance to add your own touches or move straight in with not much more to do than unpack! Spend your weekends relaxing and exploring everything this popular bayside town has to offer with both the Clifton Springs Golf Club and boat ramp close by.
Terms: 10% deposit
Settlement: 60 days or sooner by agreement

Description:
North Facing Bay Views
Bay views across our beautiful north facing Corio Bay and the You Yangs are obtained from the upstairs living area and deck of this 2 storey Clifton Springs home. Positioned close to schools, public transport, waterfront walking tracks, shops and playgrounds, the home comprises 3 bedrooms plus study (or 4th), 2 bathrooms & 2 living areas and is a fantastic opportunity to get into the 3222 market at an affordable price with views and growth potential. Upstairs enjoys an open plan living area flowing from the well-appointed kitchen through the lounge and out onto the North facing deck, whilst the downstairs living area is perfect for a teenager’s retreat. Ample off street parking, garage and private rear yard are all perfect requirements conducive to comfortable family living.
Insights: 13 Carapooka Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 4 Corio Bay Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Stunning Lifestyle Property
Exquisitely presented throughout, this outstanding home provides luxurious family living is perfectly located within an exclusive cul-de-sac which is part of the exclusive High Ridge Estate.
Set privately within a lush garden setting, the stunning home offers a light filled, flowing floor-plan with a combination of garden & bay vistas. Presented in perfect order throughout the home includes a powder room, generous formal lounge & dining room leading to an expansive open plan family/meals area with a well appointed kitchen featuring beautiful granite bench tops & European appliances. The centre piece of the home is a fully enclosed indoor heated pool (12m x 3m) perfect for relaxation & entertaining. Complemented by 3 bedrooms, with the Master bedroom having walk in robes & a fully renovated ensuite. Also with a 4th bedroom/study with amazing views of the gardens, the bay & beyond.
The original garage has been turned into a studio room that would be the envy of those who are artistically inclined. Set off to the side of the home is a four bay garage perfect for a small home business or storage for all of your lifestyle toys.
This superbly presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private & access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this prestigious location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Land size: 3800sqm approx.
Insights: 4 Corio Bay Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.
